name: searchVideos
description: This endpoint searches for videos. If you specify more than one search parameter, the API uses an AND condition. Array parameters can be specified multiple times; in this case, the API uses an AND or an OR condition with those values, depending on the parameter. You can also filter search terms out in the `query` parameter by prefixing the term with NOT.

added_date.description: Show videos added on the specified date

added_date_start.description: Show videos added on or after the specified date

added_date_end.description: Show videos added before the specified date

aspect_ratio.description: Show videos with the specified aspect ratio

category.description: Show videos with the specified Shutterstock-defined category; specify a category name or ID

contributor.description: Show videos with the specified artist names or IDs

contributor_country.description: Show videos from contributors in one or more specified countries

duration.description: (Deprecated; use duration_from and duration_to instead) Show videos with the specified duration in seconds

duration_from.description: Show videos with the specified duration or longer in seconds

duration_to.description: Show videos with the specified duration or shorter in seconds

fps.description: (Deprecated; use fps_from and fps_to instead) Show videos with the specified frames per second

fps_from.description: Show videos with the specified frames per second or more

fps_to.description: Show videos with the specified frames per second or fewer

keyword_safe_search.description: Hide results with potentially unsafe keywords

language.description: Set query and result language (uses Accept-Language header if not set)

license.description: Show only videos with the specified license or licenses

model.description: Show videos with each of the specified models

people_age.description: Show videos that feature people of the specified age range

people_ethnicity.description: Show videos with people of the specified ethnicities

people_gender.description: Show videos with people with the specified gender

people_number.description: Show videos with the specified number of people

people_model_released.description: Show only videos of people with a signed model release

query.description: One or more search terms separated by spaces; you can use NOT to filter out videos that match a term

resolution.description: Show videos with the specified resolution

sort.description: Sort by one of these categories

view.description: Amount of detail to render in the response

$ul: **search_id**: Unique identifier for the search request
**total_count**: Total count of all results across all pages
